title: What’s the Latest in the Ahmaud Arbery Murder Trial?
sub_head: Three white Georgia men stand trial for murder in the death of a Black man, Ahmaud Arbery
body:
The trial of the three white Georgia men charged in the murder of Ahmaud Arbery, a Black man, began Nov. 5. in Brunswick, Ga.
Prosecutors argued Gregory McMichael, his son Travis McMichael and neighbor William “Roddie” Bryan Jr. hunted down Mr. Arbery and killed him based on sketchy suspicions. Defense attorneys argued he was killed by men trained in law enforcement who were protecting their neighborhood after a rash of burglaries and thefts.
